00033 #ifndef PAGE_SIZE
00035 #define PAGE_SIZE (getpagesize())
00036 #endif
00037 #ifndef PAGE_MASK
00039 #define PAGE_MASK ~(PAGE_SIZE-1)
00040 #endif
00041 #ifndef PAGE_TRUNC
00043 #define PAGE_TRUNC(ptr) (ptr&(PAGE_MASK))
00044 #endif
00045 #endif

00047 /*
00048  * Initialize the object to use memory-mapping to access the file.
00049  */
00050 DataSet::DataSet(const std::string& fileName_, const DataSetHeader& header_, void* handle, bool loadEntireDataSetHint_)
00051 {
00052         fileName = fileName_;
00053         header = header_;
00054 
00055         mappedData = 0;
00056         data = 0;
00057         isOpen = false;
00058 
00059 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00060         fileMapHandle = handle;
00061 #else
00062         fp = 0;
00063 #endif
00064         mapStart = 0;
00065         mapLen = 0;
00066         fileStream = 0;
00067         useMemoryMapping = true;
00068         loadEntireDataSetHint = loadEntireDataSetHint_;
00069 }
00070 
00071 /*
00072  * Initialize the object to use std::ifstream to access the file.
00073  */
00074 DataSet::DataSet(const std::string& fileName_, const affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader& header_, std::ifstream& ifs, bool loadEntireDataSetHint_)
00075 {
00076         fileName = fileName_;
00077         header = header_;
00078 
00079         mappedData = 0;
00080         data = 0;
00081         isOpen = false;
00082 
00083 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00084         fileMapHandle = 0;
00085 #else
00086         fp = 0;
00087 #endif
00088         mapStart = 0;
00089         mapLen = 0;
00090         fileStream = &ifs;
00091         useMemoryMapping = false;
00092         loadEntireDataSetHint = loadEntireDataSetHint_;
00093 }

00113 /*
00114  * Open the DataSet for reading
00115  */
00116 bool DataSet::Open()
00117 {
00118         UpdateColumnByteOffsets();
00119 
00120         if (useMemoryMapping)
00121                 isOpen = OpenMM();
00122         else
00123         {
00124                 ReadDataSetUsingStream();
00125                 isOpen = true;
00126         }
00127         return isOpen;
00128 }
00129 
00130 /*
00131  * Open the file using memory-mapping
00132  */
00133 bool DataSet::OpenMM()
00134 {
00135 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00136         if (MapDataWin32(header.GetDataStartFilePos(), header.GetDataSize()) == false)
00137                 return false;
00138 #else
00139         // Open the file
00140         fp = fopen(fileName.c_str(), "r");
00141         if (fp == NULL)
00142         {
00143                 return false;
00144         }
00145 
00146         if (MapDataPosix(header.GetDataStartFilePos(), header.GetDataSize()) == false)
00147                 return false;
00148 #endif
00149 
00150         return true;
00151 }
00152 
00153 /*
00154  * Reads the DataSet data from the file into a memory buffer.
00155  */
00156 void DataSet::ReadDataSetUsingStream()
00157 {
00158         if(loadEntireDataSetHint == false)
00159                 return;
00160 
00161         mapLen = header.GetDataSize();
00162         mapStart = header.GetDataStartFilePos();
00163 
00164         data = new char[mapLen];
00165         fileStream->seekg(mapStart);
00166         fileStream->read(data, mapLen);
00167 }
00168 
00169 /*
00170  * Close the DataSet
00171  */
00172 void DataSet::Close()
00173 {
00174         if (useMemoryMapping)
00175                 UnmapFile ();
00176         else
00177                 ClearStreamData();
00178 }

00180 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00181 
00182 std::string GetErrorMsg()
00183 {
00184         LPVOID lpMsgBuf;
00185         if (!FormatMessage( 
00186                         FORMAT_MESSAGE_ALLOCATE_BUFFER | 
00187                         FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM | 
00188                         FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,
00189                         NULL,
00190                         GetLastError(),
00191                         MAKELANGID(LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT), // Default language
00192                         (LPTSTR) &lpMsgBuf,
00193                         0,
00194                         NULL ))
00195         {
00196                 // Handle the error.
00197                 return "";
00198         }
00199 
00200         std::string message = (char*)lpMsgBuf;
00201 
00202         // Free the buffer.
00203         LocalFree( lpMsgBuf );
00204 
00205         return message;
00206 }

00208 /*
00209  * Map the data on Win32
00210  */
00211 bool DataSet::MapDataWin32(u_int32_t start, u_int32_t bytes)
00212 {
00213         mapStart = start;
00214 
00215         if (bytes > MaxViewSize)
00216         {
00217                 bytes = MaxViewSize;    // limit the amount of data mapped
00218         }
00219 
00220         SYSTEM_INFO sysinfo;
00221         GetSystemInfo (&sysinfo);
00222         u_int64_t qwFileOffset = u_int64_t(start);
00223         DWORD dwOffset = DWORD(qwFileOffset % sysinfo.dwAllocationGranularity);
00224         qwFileOffset = (qwFileOffset / sysinfo.dwAllocationGranularity) *
00225                                                                 sysinfo.dwAllocationGranularity;
00226         DWORD dwOffsetHigh = DWORD(qwFileOffset >> 32);
00227         DWORD dwOffsetLow  = DWORD(qwFileOffset & 0xFFFFFFFF);
00228         DWORD dwBytesToMap = bytes + dwOffset;
00229 
00230         if (mappedData != 0)
00231         {
00232                 UnmapViewOfFile (mappedData);
00233         }
00234         mappedData = MapViewOfFile(fileMapHandle, FILE_MAP_READ, dwOffsetHigh, dwOffsetLow, dwBytesToMap);
00235         if (mappedData == 0)
00236         {
00237                 std::string msg = GetErrorMsg();
00238                 data = 0;
00239                 fileMapHandle = NULL;
00240                 mapStart = 0;
00241                 return false;
00242         }
00243         mapLen = bytes;
00244         data = (char *)mappedData + dwOffset;
00245         return true;
00246 }
00247 
00248 #else
00249 
00250 /*
00251  * Map the data on Linux
00252  */
00253 bool DataSet::MapDataPosix(u_int32_t start, u_int32_t bytes)
00254 {
00255         mapStart = start;
00256         if (fp == NULL)
00257                 return false;
00258 
00259         u_int32_t page_start = PAGE_TRUNC(start);
00260         u_int32_t page_offset = start - page_start;
00261         mapLen = bytes + page_offset;
00262 
00263         // Get the file size
00264         struct stat st;
00265         if (stat(fileName.c_str(), &st) == 0)
00266         {
00267                 int fileLen = st.st_size;
00268                 if (fileLen < page_start + mapLen)
00269                         mapLen = fileLen - page_start;
00270         }
00271 
00272         // Map the file.
00273         mappedData = mmap(NULL, mapLen, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED, fileno(fp), page_start);
00274         if (mappedData == MAP_FAILED)
00275         {
00276                 Close();
00277                 return false;
00278         }
00279         else
00280         {
00281                 data = ((char *)mappedData) + page_offset;
00282         }
00283         return true;
00284 }
00285 #endif
00286 
00287 /*
00288  * Close the memory-map
00289  */
00290 void DataSet::UnmapFile()
00291 {
00292 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00293 
00294         // Unmap the view
00295         if (mappedData != 0 )
00296         {
00297                 UnmapViewOfFile(mappedData);
00298                 mappedData = 0;
00299         }
00300         fileMapHandle = NULL;
00301         data = 0;
00302         mapStart = 0;
00303         mapLen = 0;
00304 
00305 #else
00306         if (fp != NULL)
00307         {
00308                 if (mappedData)
00309                 {
00310                         munmap(mappedData, mapLen);
00311                         mapLen = 0;
00312                         mappedData = 0;
00313                 }
00314                 fclose(fp);
00315                 fp = NULL;
00316         }
00317 #endif
00318 }
00319 
00320 /*
00321  * Delete the buffer
00322  */
00323 void DataSet::ClearStreamData()
00324 {
00325         delete[] data;
00326         data = 0;
00327         mapStart = 0;
00328         mapLen = 0;
00329 }

00331 /*
00332  * Check the row, column and expected column type
00333  */
00334 void DataSet::CheckRowColumnAndType(int32_t row, int32_t col, DataSetColumnTypes type)
00335 {
00336         if (isOpen == false)
00337         {
00338                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e;
00339                 throw e;
00340         }
00341 
00342         if (col < 0 || col >= header.GetColumnCnt())
00343         {
00344                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::ColumnIndexOutOfBoundsException e;
00345                 throw e;
00346         }
00347 
00348         if (row < 0 || row >= header.GetRowCnt())
00349         {
00350                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::RowIndexOutOfBoundsException e;
00351                 throw e;
00352         }
00353 
00354         // Check if the data type is expected
00355 
00356         if (header.GetColumnInfo(col).GetColumnType() != type)
00357         {
00358                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::UnexpectedColumnTypeException e;
00359                 throw e;
00360         }
00361 }
00362 
00363 /*
00364  * Detemine the address of data given row and col.  Ensure all requested data is mapped
00365  */
00366 char* DataSet::FilePosition(int32_t rowStart, int32_t col, int32_t rowCount)
00367 {
00368         if (isOpen == false)
00369         {
00370                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotOpenException e;
00371                 throw e;
00372         }
00373 
00374         // Limit row count
00375         if (rowCount > header.GetRowCnt())
00376                 rowCount= header.GetRowCnt();
00377 
00378         if (useMemoryMapping == false && loadEntireDataSetHint == false)
00379         {
00380                 return LoadDataAndReturnFilePosition(rowStart, col, rowCount);
00381         }
00382 
00383         // Byte offset in data set + byte offset of data set in file
00384         u_int32_t startByte = BytesPerRow()*rowStart + columnByteOffsets[col] + header.GetDataStartFilePos();
00385 
00386 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00387 
00388         if (useMemoryMapping)
00389         {
00390                 // Byte offset in data set + byte offset of data set in file
00391                 u_int32_t endByte = BytesPerRow()*(rowStart+rowCount-1) + columnByteOffsets[col+1] + header.GetDataStartFilePos();      // as long as col is in bounds this is safe.
00392 
00393                 // Remap the file if necessary
00394                 if (startByte < mapStart || endByte > mapStart+mapLen)
00395                 {
00396                         if (startByte < mapStart)       // moving backwards through the data, attempt to find an optimum startByte.
00397                         {
00398                                 u_int32_t reverseStartByte = 0;
00399                                 if (endByte > MaxViewSize)
00400                                         reverseStartByte = endByte - MaxViewSize;
00401 
00402                                 // Don't go above the DataSet data
00403                                 if (reverseStartByte < header.GetDataStartFilePos())
00404                                         reverseStartByte = header.GetDataStartFilePos();
00405 
00406                                 if (MapDataWin32(reverseStartByte, header.GetDataStartFilePos() + header.GetDataSize() - reverseStartByte) == false)
00407                                 {
00408                                         affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetRemapException e;
00409                                         throw e;
00410                                 }
00411                         }
00412                         else    // forward
00413                         {
00414                                 if (MapDataWin32(startByte, header.GetDataStartFilePos() + header.GetDataSize() - startByte) == false)
00415                                 {
00416                                         affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetRemapException e;
00417                                         throw e;
00418                                 }
00419                         }
00420                 }
00421         }
00422 #endif
00423 
00424         char*   filePosition = data + (startByte-mapStart);
00425         return filePosition;
00426 }
00427 
00428 /*
00429  *
00430  */
00431 char* DataSet::LoadDataAndReturnFilePosition(int32_t rowStart, int32_t col, int32_t rowCount)
00432 {
00433         // Delete the previous data
00434         ClearStreamData();
00435 
00436         mapLen = BytesPerRow()*rowCount;
00437         mapStart = BytesPerRow()*rowStart + columnByteOffsets[col] + header.GetDataStartFilePos();
00438 
00439         data = new char[mapLen];
00440         fileStream->seekg(mapStart);
00441         fileStream->read(data, mapLen);
00442         return data;
00443 }
00444 
00445 /*
00446  * Update the column sizes
00447  */
00448 void DataSet::UpdateColumnByteOffsets()
00449 {
00450         columnByteOffsets.clear();
00451 
00452         int32_t accum = 0;
00453         int32_t cols = header.GetColumnCnt();
00454         for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col)
00455         {
00456                 columnByteOffsets.push_back(accum);
00457                 accum += header.GetColumnInfo(col).GetSize();
00458         }
00459         columnByteOffsets.push_back(accum);
00460 }

00525 
00526 int32_t DataSet::ComputeEndRow(int32_t startRow, int32_t count)
00527 {
00528         int32_t rows = startRow + count;
00529         if (count == -1 || (rows > header.GetRowCnt()))
00530                 rows = header.GetRowCnt();
00531 
00532         return rows;
00533 }
00534 
00535 template<typename T> void DataSet::ClearAndSizeVector(std::vector<T>& values, u_int32_t size)
00536 {
00537         values.clear();
00538         values.resize(size);
00539 }
00540 
00541 template<typename T> void DataSet::GetDataT(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, T& values)
00542 {
00543         int32_t endRow = ComputeEndRow(startRow, count);
00544         ClearAndSizeVector(values, endRow-startRow);
00545 
00546         if (header.GetColumnCnt() > 1)
00547         {
00548                 for (int32_t row = startRow; row < endRow; ++row)
00549                 {
00550                         // Get the data
00551                         char* instr = FilePosition(row, col);
00552                         AssignValue(row-startRow, values, instr);
00553                 }
00554         }
00555         else
00556         {
00557                 char* instr = FilePosition(startRow, col, count);
00558                 int32_t recomputePositionRow = LastRowMapped();
00559 
00560                 for (int32_t row = startRow; row < endRow; ++row)
00561                 {
00562                         if (row > recomputePositionRow)
00563                         {
00564                                 instr = FilePosition(row, col, count-row);
00565                                 recomputePositionRow = LastRowMapped();
00566                         }
00567                         AssignValue(row-startRow, values, instr);
00568                 }
00569         }
00570 }

00662 template<typename T> int32_t DataSet::GetDataRawT(int32_t col, int32_t startRow, int32_t count, T* values)
00663 {
00664         int32_t endRow = ComputeEndRow(startRow, count);
00665 
00666         if (header.GetColumnCnt() > 1)
00667         {
00668                 for (int32_t row = startRow; row < endRow; ++row)
00669                 {
00670                         char* instr = FilePosition(row, col);
00671                         AssignValue(row-startRow, values, instr);
00672                 }
00673         }
00674         else // optimize
00675         {
00676                 char* instr = FilePosition(startRow, col, count);
00677                 int32_t recomputePositionRow = LastRowMapped();
00678 
00679                 for (int32_t row = startRow; row < endRow; ++row)
00680                 {
00681                         if (row > recomputePositionRow)
00682                         {
00683                                 instr = FilePosition(row, col, count-row);
00684                                 recomputePositionRow = LastRowMapped();
00685                         }
00686                         AssignValue(row-startRow, values, instr);
00687                 }
00688         }
00689         return endRow-startRow;
00690 }

00722 void DataSet::AssignValue(int32_t index, float* values, char*& instr)
00723 {
00724         values[index] = FileInput::ReadFloat(instr);
00725 }

00728 {
00729         values[index] = FileInput::ReadString8(instr);
00730 }

00732 {
00733         values[index] = FileInput::ReadString16(instr);
00734 }

00781 int32_t DataSet::LastRowMapped()
00782 {
00783         return (mapLen+(mapStart-header.GetDataStartFilePos()))/BytesPerRow() - 1;
00784 }
